headline: Johnson & Johnson outlook, MP Materials surges: Trending Tickers
summary: Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) shares tick higher in pre-market trading after the company raised its full-year earnings and sales guidance, though looming pharmaceutical tariffs from President Trump remain a key risk for the sector. MP Materials (MP) stock jumped after Apple (AAPL) announced a $500 million deal to buy rare earth magnets and build a rare earth recycling facility in California. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief: Market Sunrise here.

headline: Apple lags in AI race: What that means for the stock
summary: Investors are cooling on Apple (AAPL) as other tech giants race ahead in the artificial intelligence (AI) boom. New York Life Investments economist and portfolio strategist Lauren Goodwin and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss why Apple's slow rollout of AI features has left it behind peers that are already delivering consumer use cases. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid here.
